derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'little crown'): from Latin, diminutive of corona 'wreath, crown, chaplet'

means.word_mean: 1. (botany) the whorl of petals of a flower that collectively form an inner floral envelope or layer of the perianth;
